item.title: First Ask Then Answer: A Framework Design for AI Dialogue Based on Supplementary Questioning with Large Language Models
item.description: arXiv:2508.08308v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Large Language Models (LLMs) often struggle to deliver accurate and actionable answers when user-provided information is incomplete or ill-specified. We propose a new interaction paradigm, First Ask Then Answer (FATA), in which, through prompt words, ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> arxiv, reasoning, large language model, experiment, model | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: UrzaGPT: LoRA-Tuned Large Language Models for Card Selection in Collectible Card Games
item.description: arXiv:2508.08382v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Collectible card games (CCGs) are a difficult genre for AI due to their partial observability, long-term decision-making, and evolving card sets. Due to this, current AI models perform vastly worse than human players at CCG tasks such as deckbuilding ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> fine-tuning, zero-shot, arxiv, large language model, model | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)
